pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Homogeneous Markov and Hidden Markov Multistate Models // Fits non-homogeneous Markov multistate models and misclassification-type hidden Markov models in continuous time to intermittently observed data. Implements the methods in Titman (2011) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2010.01550.x. Uses direct numerical solution of the Kolmogorov forward equations to calculate the transition probabilities.
